channel.title: [RESOLVED - FIXED] Fix the stats page
channel.description: I suggest that [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=stats]this page[/url] gets fixed, it's just useless if it only displays fake info (Tom apparently has 9 million posts, the six highest topic starters are all fake accounts)

item.title: [RESOLVED - FIXED] Fix the stats page
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Hi Ambokile

We’ve logged your issue in the ticketing system. To track the progress of your ticket please search TNHD-2736-Z.

Kind regards,
Forum Engineering Team

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - FIXED] Fix the stats page
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:5, topic:527335”]Hey, thanks for reporting this issue! I’ve spoken with forum technicians and the bug which was causing this issue has been resolved.[/quote]Thanks man, it was really upsetting to see that you only had 9 million posts when I’m sure you’ve contributed much more than that.

Any chance of fixing the thread starters list?

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - FIXED] Fix the stats page
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

His posts yesterday were “I am a geek!!” so 6 million’s a bit of a depressing score.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - FIXED] Fix the stats page

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Hey, thanks for reporting this issue! I’ve spoken with forum technicians and the bug which was causing this issue has been resolved.

item.title: [RESOLVED - FIXED] Fix the stats page
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Jmood:

Not fake info expect for Toms fake post count, who cares if the top 6 accounts for topic starts are bots. Why do you people act like any of those numbers matter, if you don’t like looking at it then don’t even click the link.

That’s like saying “If you don’t like the forum just dont visit - don’t bother making suggestions!”

Read full topic
